description:
average value of the instantaneous unavailability over a given time interval (t1, t2).
Note 1 The mean unavailability is related to the instantaneous unavailability U(t) as: 
U¯¯¯(t1, t2)=1t2−t1∫  t2 t1U(t) dt

Note 2 Terms 'mean' or 'average' are used as synonyms  to the arithmetic mean.
